# Load packages
```{r}
library(sf)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(raster)
```

# Load data
Downloaded from: https://knb.ecoinformatics.org/view/doi:10.5063/F12B8WBS
2003 
```{r}
footprint2003 <- raster(here("raw_data/Human_footprint/cumulative_impact_2003.tif"))
```

```{r}
plot(footprint2003)
```

2013
```{r}
footprint2013 <- raster(here("raw_data/Human_footprint/cumulative_impact_2013.tif"))
```

```{r}
plot(footprint2013)
```
